title: If Wudu water drops on other limbs do I have to repeat my Wudu? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: he says some schools of thought say that when i'm washing my face if some of the water drops on my arms then i have to repeat my wudu this is totally bogus and false and baseless no problem none whatsoever if you wash one area and it falls on the other area the wudu is still intact and valid
